posts.text: Huaiyuan Rao I am a senior researcher at [Huawei Noah's Ark Lab](https://www.noahlab.com.hk/), Beijing, where I work on deep learning, model compression, and computer vision, etc. Before that, I did my PhD at school of EECS, [Peking University](https://www.pku.edu.cn/), where I was co-advised by Prof. [Chao Xu](https://dblp.org/pers/hd/x/Xu_0006:Chao) and Prof. [Dacheng Tao](https://scholar.google.com.sg/citations?user=RwlJNLcAAAAJ). I did my bachelors at school of science, [Xidian University](https://en.xidian.edu.cn/).

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
